price: (Yaa Muhammad!) isaan irraa gara galii “nagaan (isin irra haa jiraatu)” jedhiin; (waan isaan mudatu) fuula dura beekuuf jiru.
arabic: فَٱصۡفَحۡ عَنۡهُمۡ وَقُلۡ سَلَٰمٞۚ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fa-iṣ'faḥ ʿanhum waqul salāmun fasawfa yaʿlamūna
